c1: Left mouse click and hold to aim your dash, then dash into door!
c2: Every time you stick to a platform, your dash refreshes.
c3: While aiming your dash, move the mouse closer to Fluz to adjust dash distance
c4: Left click in mid air to get a mid-air dash (2 dashes total)
c6: You can stick to any side of the platforms
c7: Hold [X] to dampen your horizontal motion.
c8: Hold [X] to dampen your horizontal motion.
